com.sixdimensions.wcm.cq.component.bindings

Interface CQVariables


  • public interface CQVariables
    Extends the Sling Bindings to make available all of the objects the <cq:defineObjects /> tag adds as well as the sling objects.
    Author:
    dklco
    See Also:
    SlingBindings

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String COMPONENT
      The key for the current AEM component object of the current resource.
      static String COMPONENT_CONTEXT
      The key for the current component context object of the request.
      static String CURRENT_DESIGN
      They key for the current design object of the current page.
      static String CURRENT_PAGE
      The key for the current AEM WCM page object.
      static String CURRENT_STYLE
      The key for the current style object of the current cell.
      static String DESIGNER
      The key for the designer object used to access design information.
      static String EDIT_CONTEXT
      The key for the edit context object of the AEM component.
      static String PAGE_MANAGER
      The key for the page manager object for page level operations.
      static String PAGE_PROPERTIES
      The key for the page properties object of the current page.
      static String PROPERTIES
      The key for the properties object of the current resource.
      static String RESOURCE_DESIGN
      The key for the design object of the resource page.
      static String RESOURCE_PAGE
      The key for the page containing the current resource.
      static String SESSION
      The key for the JCR Session.
      static String SLING
      The key for the Sling helper.
      static String XSS_API
      The key for the XSS API.

      • getCurrentPage

        com.day.cq.wcm.api.Page getCurrentPage()
        Gets the current page. This is the page which is currently rendering the resource which may be different than the page under which the resource is physically located.
        Returns:
        the current page

        boolean getFlush()

        Returns:

      • getResourcePage

        com.day.cq.wcm.api.Page getResourcePage()
        Gets the page containing the current resource. This may be different than getPage if the resource is included from another page.
        Returns:
        the page containing the current resource

      • getResponse

        org.apache.sling.api.SlingHttpServletResponse getResponse()

        Returns:
        the current Sling Servlet Response
